Temple promised by BJP transforms India's Ayodhya but Muslims, some locals feel neglectedIn this northern Indian city once marred by communal tensions, labourers are finalizing a $6 billion infrastructure facelift ahead of the opening of a grand Hindu temple that is igniting an economic boom - which some of Ayodhya's poor and its Muslim community say is passing them by. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 02:06:54 GMT MGKY3BLMR5K7LKED6PFIWM3ENA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/temple-promised-by-bjp-transforms-indian-city-muslims-some-locals-feel-neglected-2023-12-18/Aditya Kalra, Saurabh Sharma, Dhwani Pandya世界印度
Taiwan reports more suspected Chinese weather balloons crossing Taiwan StraitTwo suspected Chinese weather balloons flew across the sensitive Taiwan Strait on Sunday but stayed well to the north of Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Monday, the second time this month Taipei has reported them nearby. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 01:11:36 GMT F5KTRNHS3ZJJDHP6CDYRPQ53CA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-Detected-two-chinese-balloons-crossing-taiwan-strait-sunday-defence-2023-12-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
Security tight ahead of landmark trial for leading Hong Kong democratA landmark national security trial for China critic Jimmy Lai will open in Hong Kong, with the pro-democracy activist battling charges that he colluded with foreign forces. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 00:58:29 GMT CZ6LFYDAJ5LKPAV4IDP4B2XIP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/security-tight-ahead-landmark-Trial-leading-hong-kong-democrat-2023-12-18/Jessie Pang, James Pomfret世界中国
UK minister visits Guyana amid border dispute with VenezuelaA junior British foreign minister on Monday said Guyana's territorial integrity should be respected as he visited the Commonwealth country after neighbouring Venezuela renewed its claim to the oil-rich Essequibo region. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 00:03:43 GMT MLHO4D5UP5NQPL5FHPEWCSADEE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/uk-minister-visits-guyana-amid-border-dispute-with-venezuela-2023-12-18/Reuters世界美洲
UN Security Council moving toward vote to demand aid access for GazaThe United Nations Security Council could vote as early as Monday on a proposal to demand that Israel and Hamas allow aid access to the Gaza Strip - via land, sea and air routes - and set up U.N. monitoring of the humanitarian assistance delivered. Sun, 17 Dec 2023 23:41:39 GMT 3I5ECQFVWRIZLNCVAPMOIE6QCY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-security-council-moving-toward-vote-demand-aid-access-gaza-2023-12-17/Michelle Nichols世界中东
North Korea fires what appears to be long-range ballistic missileNorth Korea fired what appeared to be a long-range ballistic missile on Monday, South Korea and Japan said, its second missile launch in less than 12 hours as Pyongyang condemned a U.S.-led show of force against the nuclear armed state. Sun, 17 Dec 2023 23:37:53 GMT LVRZHU4L35KY3LRN57XVXX3AC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-ballistic-missile-south-korea-says-2023-12-17/Soo-Hyang Choi, Kantaro Komiya世界亚太地区
Storm claims more lives in Argentina and Uruguay, bringing death toll to 16The death toll from a severe electrical storm that struck Argentina over the weekend has risen to 16 people in Argentina and the neighboring country of Uruguay. Floods cut off cyclone-hit Australia tourist towns along Great Barrier ReefHeavy rain from a coastal trough linked to ex-Tropical Cyclone Jasper cut off several tourist towns in Australia's north along the Great Barrier Reef, forcing evacuations as some residents fled to rooftops. Majority of Chileans reject new conservative constitution - early resultsEarly results show that a majority of Chileans voted to reject a new conservative constitution to replace its dictatorship-era text. Attack at Mexico holiday party leaves 12 dead - authoritiesA dozen people were killed in an attack at a holiday party in the central Mexican state of Guanajuato, Mexican authorities said Sunday.
